department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Tender for Services d'entretien Correctif - ALFC- Edmonton
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer: Responsive Maintenance Services for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency

### Tend of Title:
W3706-24-ED03 Responsive Maintenance Services - CFHA - Edmonton

### Solicitation Number:
WS4215290119

### Tendering Information:

* **Publication Date:** March 1, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, 2:00 pm EST
* **Amendment Date:** January 11, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024

### Tender Description:

The Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) is seeking a supplier to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio. The services will be performed in accordance with the Statement of Work, which is attached as Annex A to this tender.

**Services to be Provided:**

* Landscaping
* Snow removal
* Facilities management

**Trade Agreements:**

The trade agreements applicable to this procurement are listed below:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### How to Submit Bids:

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through Aribadiscovery.com. Bids must be submitted by the tender closing date and time of February 2, 2024, 2:00 pm EST. Bidders are advised to confirm their attendance at one of the two optional teleconferences scheduled for December 19, 2023 (English) and December 20, 2023 (French). 

**Points of Contact:**

For more information, please contact Christine Seguin at (SPAC/PSPC). Her email address is christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
